en.Name: HK MP5K-PDW old stock model
en.Description: Folding stock that was installed on MP5K-PDW before it was replaced by the UMP-like folding stock.

en.Name: MP5K "Reverse Stretch" Upper receiver
en.Description: The so called "Reverse Stretch" upper receivers feature an extended rear part in order to be compatible with standard MP5 stocks. In Tarkov, a small number of them are occasionally produced by Mechanic.

en.Name: HK MP5K-PDW Upper receiver
en.Description: Upper receiver for the MP5K-PDW manufactured by HK. Allows for installation of muzzle devices.

en.Name: MP5 "Waffle" pattern 30-round 9x19 magazine
en.Description: 30-round straight 9x19 magazine for MP5. This is the first production MP5 style of magazine.

en.Name: SureFire 628 flashlight head
en.Description: Flashlight head, designed to be mounted on the SureFire 628 forend. Due to its size, it is incompatible with suppressors.

en.Name: MP5 Slimline Polymer handguard
en.Description: Polymer handguard, mounted on the first production models of the MP5, the so-called Slimline version.

en.Name: MP5 SureFire 628 Polymer Handguard
en.Description: The iconic weapon light for the MP5.

en.Name: SVD Izhmash 7.62x54 SVD flash hider with bayonet lug
en.Description: Standard Izhmash-produced front sight assembly with permanently affixed long slotted flash hider and a bayonet lug.

en.Name: SVD 7.62x54R 24 inch barrel
en.Description: A 24" barrel for SVD chambered in 7.62x54 ammo.

en.Name: SVD Wooden handguard
en.Description: Classic SVD handguard manufactured by Izhmash.

en.Name: SVD Wooden stock
en.Description: Wooden stock for SVD manufactured by Izhmash.

en.Name: SVD Polymer stock
en.Description: Polymer stock for SVD manufactured by Izhmash. Installed on modern day SVD rifles.

en.Name: SVD Wooden thumbhole stock for Tigr carbine
en.Description: Wooden stock that can be commonly found on Tigr civilian carbines.

en.Name: SVD SniperArms Dynamic stock adapter
en.Description: Adapter for installation of telescopic stock buffer tubes on SVDs with non-folding stocks.

en.Name: SVD 7.62x54 Sniper rifle (Fixed stock)
en.Description: Dragunov sniper rifle was developed in 1963 as a squad support weapon, since, according to Soviet doctrine, long-range engagement ability was lost to ordinary troops due to adoption of submachine guns and assault rifles.

en.Name: Colt M16A1 Rearsight aperture
en.Description: Original Colt M16 rear flip aperture used on M16 and M16A1 models.

en.Name: Colt A1 AR-15 pistol grip
en.Description: Colt A1 polymer pistol grip can be installed on any weapon compatible with AR-15 grips. A1 grip was made of older and less durable polymers, but due to the lack of the finger groove, it is almost universally considered superior to its supposed "improved" version.

en.Name: 5.56x45 Colt AR-15 STANAG 20-round magazine
en.Description: A 20-round metal Colt AR-15 magazine was designed before the STANAG 4179 standard for 5.56x45 ammo, but it still can be fitted in any weapon that is compatible with STANAG magazines.

en.Name: Colt XM16E1 5.56x45 Flash hider for AR-15
en.Description: A modern replica of a XM16E1 flash hider that can be mounted on modern barrels. 3-prong flash hiders were replaced early in Vietnam War due to their tendency to get caught on vegetation.

en.Name: Moonlight Arms Carry Handle scope mount
en.Description: Custom-made carry handle scope mount.

en.Name: M16 5.56x45 18 inch barrel (rifle length)
en.Description: A M16 barrel for AR-15 based weapons for 5.56x45 NATO ammo, 18 inches long. Rifle-length gas system.

en.Name: M16 5.56x45 20 inch barrel (rifle length)
en.Description: A M16 barrel for AR-15 based weapons for 5.56x45 NATO ammo, 20 inches long. Rifle-length gas system.

en.Name: AR-15 Colt USGI A2 handguard
en.Description: Standard service handguard for M16A2.

en.Name: Colt USGI A1 handguard for AR-15s
en.Description: The legendary "triangular" handguard, most closely associated with the Vietnam era.

en.Name: Colt USGI A1 shortened handguard for AR-15s
en.Description: Shortened version of the USGI A1 handguard that was used on M16A1-based carbines.

en.Name: AR-15 KAC M5 RAS handguard
en.Description: Knight's Armament KAC M5 RAS is a standard service handguard for the M16A4 rifles. Outdated by modern standards, it gets its job done nevertheless.

en.Name: Colt USGI A2 fixed stock for AR-15s
en.Description: Standard service stock for M16A2 and M16A4.

en.Name: Colt USGI A1 fixed stock for AR-15s
en.Description: A modern replica of a M16A1 stock. Unlike its improved version, A1 stock is slightly shorter and doesn't feature checkering on the buttplate nor a toolkit and overall is more fragile due to the use of less advanced polymers.

en.Name: Colt 4-position collapsible stock for AR-15s
en.Description: Third generation collapsible stock was standard for M16-based carbines, including the M4 carbines until 2001.

en.Name: Colt M16A1 5.56x45 upper receiver
en.Description: A modern replica of a M16A1 upper receiver, artificially aged to make it look more authentic. Only a select few modern scopes can be installed on this upper without modification.

en.Name: Colt M16A4 5.56x45 assault rifle
en.Description:
The latest version of the famous M16 rifle, the M16A4 was adopted by 2 US Armed Forces branches, the Army and the Marine Corp, in 1998, before it was completely phased out in favor of its more compact version, the M4A1, in 2015. Its most notable change compared to its predecessors was an introduction of a flat-top upper receiver that allowed its user to adapt their rifle for any situation.
The M16A4 fires in 3-round bursts rather than in full auto, a design choice that was considered as a valid replacement for a proper fire control training at the time of M16A2 introduction but the one that was dropped with the adoption of newer rifles.

en.Name: Kiba Arms International SPRM rail mount for AKS-74U
en.Description: The universal SPRM 11-position mount for attaching sights and scopes directly on the Kiba arms series of AKS-74U/UB dust cover. Manufactured by Kiba Arms International.

en.Name: AK-74M-like polymer handguard for AKS-74U
en.Description: This handguard is made by cutting down the already existing AK-74M handguard.

en.Name: Kiba Arms International AKS-74UB dust cover
en.Description: Kiba Arms International AKS-74UB dust cover made to take the SPRM rail mount.

en.Name: Kiba Arms International AKS-74U dust cover
en.Description: Kiba Arms International AKS-74U dust cover made to take the SPRM rail mount.

en.Name: RPK-74 Polymer handguard
en.Description: Polymer RPK-74 handguard produced to replace the wooden one.

en.Name: Izhmash 5.45x39 RPK-74 muzzle brake & compensator (6P18 1-61)
en.Description: Standard muzzle brake for RPK-74.

en.Name: Wooden RPK-74 stock
en.Description: Wooden RPK-74 stock.

en.Name: RPK-74 Polymer stock
en.Description: Polymer RPK-74 stock produced to replace the wooden one.

en.Name: RPK-74N 5.45x39 light machine gun
en.Description: Kalashnikov RPK-74N 5.45mm light machine gun was designed to replace the older RPK light machine gun chambered in 7.62x39mm due to adoption of the new 5.45x39 ammunition by the military. The key design difference from the standard RPK-74 is a side mount for optical and night scopes.

en.Name: HK 416 front sight
en.Description: Detachable front sight for older HK416s.

en.Name: HK 416 drum rear sight
en.Description: Standard rear sight for older HK416s.

en.Name: HK 416 gas block
en.Description: Standard gas block for older HK416 rifles.

en.Name: HK 416C 5.56x45 9 inch barrel
en.Description: A barrel for 416 based weapons for 5.56x45 NATO ammo, 228mm long.

en.Name: HK 416 5.56x45 14.5 inch barrel
en.Description: A barrel for 416 based weapons for 5.56x45 NATO ammo, 368mm long.

en.Name: HK 416C Quad Rail handguard
en.Description: Shortened quadrail handguard for HK 416C. Comes with a four picatinny rails for attaching wide amount of different accessories. Produced by Heckler and Koch.

en.Name: HK 416C stock
en.Description: Kit for installation on the HK416 rifles. Requires a proper bolt carrier group in order to be installed.

en.Name: Gold-plated Izhmash 7.62x39 AKM muzzle brake & compensator (6P1 0-14)
en.Description: Standard Izhmash-produced muzzle brake and compensator for AKM and weapon systems based on it.

en.Name: AKM dark wooden handguard (6P1 Sb.6-1)
en.Description: Wood on this handguard was artificially darkened in order for it to better fit with gold plating.

en.Name: Gold-plated AKM gas tube (6P1 Sb.1-2)
en.Description: Gas tube channels the travel direction of gas piston.

en.Name: AKM dark wooden pistol grip
en.Description: Wood on this pistol grip was artificially darkened in order for it to better fit with gold plating.

en.Name: Gold-plated Izhmash AKM dust cover (6P1 0-1)
en.Description: Gold-plated standard AKM top dust cover by Izhmash.

en.Name: Gold-plated AKM rear sight (6P1 Sb.2-1)
en.Description: Gold-plated standard AKM rear sight manufactured by Izhmash.

en.Name: Izhmash dark wooden AKM stock (6P1 Sb.5)
en.Description: Wood on this stock was artificially darkened in order for it to better fit with gold plating.

en.Name: Gold-plated AKMSN shoulder piece (6P4 Sb.1-19)
en.Description: Izhmash-produced folding shoulder piece assembly for AKMSN.

en.Name: Gold-plated AK 7.62x39 30-round magazine (issued '55 or later)
en.Description: Standard 30-round metal magazine for AK from 1955 onward, for 7.62x39 AK and compatible weapons.

en.Name: AKM 7.62x39 assault rifle (Gold)
en.Description: Gold-plated AKM rifle. A popular personal weapon of dictators, warlords and revolutionaries. Made by some local master for local bandits.

en.Name: AKMN 7.62x39 assault rifle (Gold)
en.Description: Gold-plated AKMN with a side mount. Made by some local master for local bandits.

en.Name: AKMS 7.62x39 assault rifle (Gold)
en.Description: Gold-plated AKMS rifle. A popular personal weapon of dictators, warlords and revolutionaries. Rumor has it that similar rifles were used by some PMC operators during the Contract Wars.

en.Name: AKMSN 7.62x39 assault rifle (Gold)
en.Description: Gold-plated AKMS with a side mount. It is possible that this particular rifle used to belong to some especially prideful PMC operator.

en.Name: Wooden AK handguard (56-A-212 Sb.6-1)
en.Description: Standard Izhmash-produced wooden AK handguard.

en.Name: Izhmash AK wooden pistol grip (56-A-212 Sb.8V)
en.Description: A wooden Izhmash pistol grip that was installed on original AK rifles.

en.Name: Izhmash AK dust cover (56-A-212 0-1)
en.Description: Gold-plated standard AKM top dust cover by Izhmash.

en.Name: Arsenal, Inc. AK47 polymer stock for milled receivers
en.Description: Black polymer stock for milled receiver AK rifles. Manufactured by Arsenal, Inc.

en.Name: Izhmash wooden AK stock (56-A-212 Sb.5)
en.Description: Standard wooden AK stock produced by Izhmash.

en.Name: AK 7.62x39 assault rifle
en.Description: AK - (Avtomat Kalashnikova - Kalashnikovs Automatic Rifle) - was adopted in 1949 as a standard service weapon of the Soviet Army. This has the Type 3 milled reciever.

en.Name: AKN 7.62x39 assault rifle
en.Description: AK - (Avtomat Kalashnikova - Kalashnikovs Automatic Rifle) - was adopted in 1949 as a standard service weapon of the Soviet Army. Surplus AK rifles that were uncovered during Contract Wars were modified by local RUAF soldiers with AKMN dovetail mounts.This has the Type 3 milled reciever.

en.Name: AI AWM muzzle brake for Arctic Warfare Magnum
en.Description: Standard muzzle brake for Arctic Warfare Magnum, designed to greatly reduce jump, flash and felt recoil, as well as serve as a base for optional iron sights and suppressors.

en.Name: AI AWM Custom 435mm .338 LM barrel
en.Description: Custom 435mm .338 LM barrel for Arctic Warfare Magnum

en.Name: AI AWM 686mm .338 LM barrel
en.Description: Standard 686mm .338 LM barrel for Arctic Warfare Magnum

en.Name: AI AWM 5-round .338 LM magazine
en.Description: Single-stack 5-round magazine for Arctic Warfare Magnum.

en.Name: AI AWM Picatinny multi-slot base
en.Description: Accuracy International scope mount is a universal mount for Arctic Warfare rifles.

en.Name: AI AWM AT-style stock for Arctic Warfare Magnum
en.Description: Custom-made stock, design of which is heavily inspired by stocks used on Accuracy International AT-series rifles.

en.Name: AI AWM stock for Arctic Warfare Magnum
en.Description: Polymer fixed stock for AWM.

en.Name: AI AWM-F stock for Arctic Warfare Magnum
en.Description: Polymer folding stock for AWM.

en.Name: Accuracy International AWM .338 LM sniper rifle
en.Description: Renowned for its precision over the long distances, Arctic Warfare Magnum is the result of further development of Arctic Warfare rifle series, designed to chamber magnum rifle cartridges.
